name: paper-toggle-button

events.name: change
events.description: Fired when the checked state changes due to user interaction.

events.name: core-change
events.description: Fired when the checked state changes.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Gets or sets the state, `true` is checked and `false` is unchecked.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
If true, the toggle button is disabled.  A disabled toggle button cannot
be tapped or dragged to change the checked state.
